nodes.text: Lifters was a card game which involved suits of cards. Between 2 BBY and 0 BBY, the rebel Briala had obtained a deck of cards, which she and the Mirialan Lylee Anaraku planned to play Lifters with aboard the CR90 corvette Thunderstrike following a mission to the planet Allst Prime. Anaraku also invited the rebel trooper Brand to play with them while on Allst Prime.
Lifters was mentioned in the short story "Inbrief," written by Janine K. Spendlove and first published in Star Wars Insider 161 on November 10, 2015.
